tasks.title: Project Initiation
tasks.description: Kick off the project by defining its scope, objectives, and key stakeholders. Create a project charter and conduct an initial team meeting to align everyone on the project goals and timeline.

tasks.title: Requirements Gathering
tasks.description: Conduct interviews and workshops with stakeholders to collect and document detailed project requirements. Create user stories, use cases, and a comprehensive requirements specification document.

tasks.title: System Design
tasks.description: Develop the high-level and low-level design of the system based on the gathered requirements. Create system architecture diagrams, database schemas, and API specifications. Conduct design reviews with the team.

tasks.title: Development Phase 1
tasks.description: Begin the implementation of core system components based on the approved design. Set up the development environment, implement basic functionality, and establish coding standards for the team.

tasks.title: Testing Phase 1
tasks.description: Conduct initial testing of the developed components. Create and execute test cases, perform unit testing, and begin integration testing. Document any bugs or issues found during this phase.

tasks.title: Development Phase 2
tasks.description: Continue system development by implementing advanced features and integrating various components. Refine existing code based on testing feedback and optimize performance where necessary.

tasks.title: Testing Phase 2
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive system testing, including integration testing, performance testing, and user acceptance testing. Conduct thorough regression testing to ensure new features haven't impacted existing functionality.

tasks.title: Deployment
tasks.description: Prepare the system for production deployment. Create deployment scripts, set up production environments, and conduct final checks. Execute the deployment plan and perform post-deployment verification.

tasks.title: Marketing
tasks.description: Marketing is the process of promoting, selling, and distributing products or services to customers. It involves identifying target audiences, understanding their needs, and developing strategies to attract and retain them. Key activities include market research, advertising, branding, and customer relationship management

tasks.title: Regular Meetup
tasks.description: Regular sync up with dev and project manager
